pycircuit use [http://git-scm.com/ GIT] as version control system. Currently the repo is hosted at [http://www.github.com github.com].

= Command-Line Access =

Anonymous access

{{{
git clone git://github.com/henjo/pycircuit.git
}}}

Developer access

{{{
git clone git@github.com:henjo/pycircuit.git
}}}

Note, to clone the tree as a developer you need a github account and write permission to the tree.

= From the web =

The pycircuit repo is currently stored at [http://www.github.com github.com] where the source tree can browsed from the web (http://github.com/henjo/pycircuit)
